title: Amazon KDP Pricing Strategy For MAXIMUM Profits

tactics.name: Price Optimization
tactics.description: Adjust pricing based on print costs and competitor analysis to maximize royalties
steps: Conduct market research on competitors' pricing
Calculate print costs using Amazon's royalty calculator
Test price increases to improve royalty per unit
Target niche audiences willing to pay premium prices
caveats: Low prices may devalue product perception
source_quotes: $1 extra...can make a tremendous difference for you

tactics.name: Royalty Threshold Pricing
tactics.description: Set a minimum royalty per unit to ensure profitability by adjusting list prices based on print costs and desired royalty rates.
steps: Use a royalty calculator to determine target royalty
Adjust list prices according to print costs and desired royalty threshold
source_quotes: I've always aimed for a minimum royalty of $2 per unit sold

tactics.name: Price Formatting Optimization
tactics.description: Standardize prices to end in .99 for psychological pricing appeal across regions.
steps: Set initial price for primary marketplace
Manually adjust regional prices to end in .99
caveats: Automated pricing may create awkward price formats
source_quotes: I usually adjust everything... to end in a 99 Cents

heuristics.name: Price Floor Adjustment
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, adjust pricing strategy
source_quotes: $1 extra...can make a tremendous difference for you

heuristics.name: Price Test Isolation
heuristics.condition: If multiple books are tested simultaneously, it may negatively impact sales momentum
source_quotes: I changed the price on about 15 books at a time... had a negative impact on my sales

claims.statement: KDP offers 60% fixed royalty for paperbacks and hardcovers
source_quotes: Amazon KDP offers a 60% fixed royalty

claims.statement: Pricing all books at $5.99 significantly reduces potential royalties
source_quotes: If you price all of your books at $5.99 it's going to be really really difficult to earn any sort of a livable income

niche_patterns.example: homeschooling parents + curriculum gaps + budget constraints
niche_patterns.description: Target specific audience segments with unique needs and willingness to pay
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Niche audiences value specialized solutions and are willing to pay premiums
source_quotes: people will spend more for something created specifically for them
